name: Castlevania Order of the Moon
description:
It's my first fangame and a love letter to the Castlevania franchise.

An RPG you can sink your fangs into!

Embark on an adventure filled with monsters, traps, and puzzles. Filled with references from numerous Castlevania titles ranging from Symphony of the Night to Belmont's Revenge. With Innocent Devils, DSS Summons, and Wall Porkchops; you will HUNT THE NIGHT!

Over 10 Hours of Gothic Goodness!

It all leads up to the Demon War of 199
